ygData.subject: Crowdsourcing a list of significant ALife papers
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, It s been years since I ve seen a broad review of the ALife field. I m going to try to crowdsource one and post the results online. What are some

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi all,

It's been years since I've seen a broad review of the ALife field. I'm
going to try to crowdsource one and post the results online.

What are some landmark papers that you think should be included in a list
of significant ALife papers? I realize that ALife is a broad field, so
that's why I'm asking a broad range of people for their input. Thanks to
anyone who replies. :-)

(please feel free to respond directly: olsonran@...)

-- 
Randal S. Olson

Computer Science PhD Student
Michigan State University
E-mail: rso@... | Twitter:
@randal_olson<https://twitter.com/randal_olson>
http://www.randalolson.com

--001a11c370f2fbc3ff04ea729ac6
